pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lint 'roxygen2'-Generated Documentation // Provides formatting linting to 'roxygen2' tags. Linters report 'roxygen2' tags that do not conform to a standard style. These linters can be a helpful check for building more consistent documentation and to provide reminders about best practices or checks for typos. Default linting suites are provided for common style guides such as the one followed by the 'tidyverse', though custom linters can be registered by other packages or be custom- tailored to a specific package.
